content: 12 14 16 16 18 row body of blanket section 1 with color b row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 repeat row 1 and 2 for 5 more repeats for a total of 12 row with color a row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 section 2 with color c row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 repeat row 1 and 2 for 5 more repeats for a total of 12 row with color a pattern by candylou s creations ~ www candylou com ~ ig pinterest etsy and ravelry @candyloucreations love squared baby blanket knitting pattern row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 section 3 with color d row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 repeat row 1 and 2 for 5 more repeats for a total of 12 row with color a row 1 knit across row 2 k6 p8 *k4 p8* repeat * until 6 stitches remain knit 6 repeat sections 1 2 and 3 until desired length outside border knit in garter stitch knit every row for 12 12 14 16 16 18 row bind off using the stretchy method and weave in ends stretchy method of binding off knit the first 2 stitches insert the left needle into the 2 stitches on the right needle and knit them together with one stitch on the needle knit the next stitch and then knit these two stitches together continue this until all stitches are off your needles pattern by candylou s creations ~ www candylou com ~ ig pinterest etsy and ravelry @candyloucreations love squared baby blanket knitting pattern sharing in the knitting community please do share your progress photos and finished projects on ravelry and instagram using the hashtags #candyloucreations and #lovesquaredbabyblanket find me at @candyloucreations on ravelry instagram and pinterest please feel free to use your creativity to make this blanket your own by choosing different colors if you like you have my permission to sell your blankets but i do hope to see your finished creations if you have any questions please feel free to email me at creations@candylou com thank you candylou pattern by candylou s creations ~ www candylou com ~ ig pinterest etsy and ravelry @candyloucreations
